entry.name: secure_get_retry
entry.text: Attempting to retrieve the WAXHN image again.
entry.description: An initial attempt to retrieve the WAXHN image failed. An attempt to retrieve the image again will begin automatically.
entry.suggestion: Ensure that the RAID array has sufficient disk space for the image. Ensure that the appliance has an Ethernet interface that can access the Internet.

entry.name: internal_tar_failure
entry.text: An internal extract routine failed with: %s

entry.name: virt_disk_net_part_repair_failed
entry.text: Repair of network configuration on image failed.
entry.description: An attempt to repair the network configuration failed. The network configuration will be recreated automatically.
entry.suggestion: Verify the integrity of the RAID volume.

entry.name: virt_disk_cache_part_repair_failed
entry.text: Repair of cache on image failed.
entry.description: An attempt to repair the cache failed. The cache will be recreated automatically.
entry.suggestion: Verify the integrity of the RAID volume.

entry.name: automatic_activate
entry.description: The current WAXHN service is incompatible with this firmware version. The appliance is retrieving a compatible version.

entry.name: activate_version_save_failed
entry.text: Activation failed to save the WAXHN version information.

entry.name: sidecar_stopped
entry.description: The WAXHN task stopped unexpectedly for the specified reason.
entry.suggestion: If the condition persists, contact IBM support.
